name: Heaven Gates
description:
Heaven Gates is a linear tower defense prototype.

It revolves around protecting the heaven gate from an demonic invasion.

Collect celestial energy to summon angels and sacred tools to prevent the demonic forces to reach heaven and inducing the end of all times.

Unpack the ZIP-Archive and play without installation.

Tips:

  1. Feathers generate celestial energy, always build them first
  2. Dark Angels are much more powerful than Holy Angels, but they have a limited range of 4 cells
  3. Red Demons can pass-through every defender despite Holy Books, place them accordingly
  4. Black Demons can attack 2 rows at once (same and row above), but can only be hit by Dark Angels of the upper row

The current features of this prototype contains:

  • 11 Progressive Levels, each including new enemy types and defenses
  • Randomized attack waves in every level and mode
  • Endless mode, for scoring maximum points
  • Various Difficulties for more challenge
  • Various game speeds to prevent tiring for more advances players
  • High-scores for each level to match yourself and your friends

Nice-to-have features which  perhaps will be implemented in the future:

  • Leader-board (endless mode) to compete against other players
  • More Randomized endless mode with peak attack waves instead of progressive increases
  • More levels, defenders and attackers
  • Spells to cast at certain enemies or lanes
  • Multiplayer VS-Mode  where one player defends and the other spawns attackers
